## Description {#details}

Manages the enabling and disabling of subtarget specific features.

Features are encoded as a string of the form &quot;+attr1,+attr2,-attr3,...,+attrN&quot; A comma separates each feature from the next (all lowercase.) Each of the remaining features is prefixed with + or - indicating whether that feature should be enabled or disabled contrary to the cpu specification.

Definition at line 174 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/targetparser/subtargetfeature-h">SubtargetFeature.h</a>.
